overview:
mgMEDIA is a company devoted to technology for digital content multi-device distribution.

The Open4Content four screen platform is the companyâ€™s focal product, offered in a SaaS (Software as a Service) model as house brand customizable for the digital distribution of premium content. It also provides TV APP development services and strategic consultancy in the field of digital content distribution for Internet-connected devices.

mgMEDIA, a company established in 2010, employs over 50 professionals, all boasting a wide range of experience in digital content distribution, 80% of whom form part of the engineering team. The company is based in Madrid (Spain) and has offices in San Francisco (California, USA). Although mgMEDIA has already consolidated its presence in the European market, its vocation is global, with the bid to conquer the USA and Latin American markets led from the Bay Area.

The company possesses a powerful network of strategic partners, in terms of technological aspects as well as content providers and systems integrators. This network includes both major multinational corporations and niche companies which work alongside mgMEDIA to offer its clients (TelCos, ISPs, broadcasters, CE manufacturers and other entertainment companies) the best over-the-top solutions available on the international market. Samsung, LG, Widevine, Intertrust, DivX, Limelight, PayPal, justAd.TV, Paramount Pictures and Warner Bros are just some.

mgMEDIA is an innovative and dynamic company which is always aware of the changes and new challenges presented by the digital ecosystem. The company is actively involved in the industryâ€™s most important forums, communities and events in order to continue strengthening its leadership in digital content distribution technology.
